name: Downtime Activity Costs
description: Costs associated with various downtime activities between adventures in D&D 2024.

activities.name: Training (Language)
activities.description: You can spend time learning a new language. You must find an instructor willing to teach you. Training lasts 250 days and costs 1 GP per day. After you spend the requisite amount of time and money, you learn the new language.

activities.name: Training (Tool Proficiency)
activities.description: You can spend time learning a new tool proficiency. You must find an instructor willing to teach you. Training lasts 250 days and costs 1 GP per day. After you spend the requisite amount of time and money, you gain proficiency with the tool.

activities.name: Research
activities.description: Spending time researching lore. You must have access to a library, sage, or similar source of knowledge. Research costs 50 GP per day spent researching, which covers expenses for materials, access fees, and so on.

activities.name: Scribing a Spell Scroll (Cantrip)
activities.description: Scribing a cantrip onto a spell scroll takes 1 day and costs 15 GP.

activities.name: Scribing a Spell Scroll (1st Level)
activities.description: Scribing a 1st-level spell onto a spell scroll takes 1 day and costs 25 GP.

activities.name: Scribing a Spell Scroll (2nd Level)
activities.description: Scribing a 2nd-level spell onto a spell scroll takes 3 days and costs 250 GP.

activities.name: Scribing a Spell Scroll (3rd Level)
activities.description: Scribing a 3rd-level spell onto a spell scroll takes 1 workweek (5 days) and costs 500 GP.

activities.name: Scribing a Spell Scroll (4th Level)
activities.description: Scribing a 4th-level spell onto a spell scroll takes 2 workweeks (10 days) and costs 2,500 GP.

activities.name: Scribing a Spell Scroll (5th Level)
activities.description: Scribing a 5th-level spell onto a spell scroll takes 4 workweeks (20 days) and costs 5,000 GP.

activities.name: Scribing a Spell Scroll (6th Level)
activities.description: Scribing a 6th-level spell onto a spell scroll takes 8 workweeks (40 days) and costs 15,000 GP.

activities.name: Scribing a Spell Scroll (7th Level)
activities.description: Scribing a 7th-level spell onto a spell scroll takes 16 workweeks (80 days) and costs 25,000 GP.

activities.name: Scribing a Spell Scroll (8th Level)
activities.description: Scribing an 8th-level spell onto a spell scroll takes 32 workweeks (160 days) and costs 50,000 GP.

activities.name: Scribing a Spell Scroll (9th Level)
activities.description: Scribing a 9th-level spell onto a spell scroll takes 48 workweeks (240 days) and costs 250,000 GP.

activities.name: Building a Stronghold
activities.description: A character can spend time building a stronghold. Costs and time vary depending on the type of structure. See the Bastion rules for details on constructing and maintaining a personal base of operations.
